tooltip.itemstages.item.description: This item has been staged to [%s]
message.itemstages.drop: 你没有足够的能力保留 %s.
message.itemstages.mine: You do not know how to mine with the %s.
message.itemstages.attack: You do not know how to attack with the %s.
message.itemstages.use: 你没有足够的能力使用 %s.
message.itemstages.pickup: 你没有足够的能力捡起 %s.
tooltip.itemstages.debug.drop: - This item will be dropped out of the inventory.
tooltip.itemstages.debug.pickup: - This item can not be picked up.
tooltip.itemstages.debug.use: - This item can not be used on blocks or entities.
tooltip.itemstages.debug.attack: - This item can not be used as a weapon.
tooltip.itemstages.debug.jei: - This item will be hidden in JEI.
